00024 #ifndef LUABIND_CONFIG_HPP_INCLUDED
00025 #define LUABIND_CONFIG_HPP_INCLUDED

00027 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00028 
00029 #ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00030         #define LUABIND_ANONYMOUS_FIX static
00031 #else
00032         #define LUABIND_ANONYMOUS_FIX
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #if defined (BOOST_MSVC) && (BOOST_MSVC <= 1200)
00036 
00037 #define for if (false) {} else for
00038 
00039 #include <cstring>
00040 
00041 namespace std
00042 {
00043         using ::strlen;
00044         using ::strcmp;
00045         using ::type_info;
00046 }
00047 
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 
00051 #if defined (BOOST_MSVC) && (BOOST_MSVC <= 1300)
00052         #define LUABIND_MSVC_TYPENAME
00053 #else
00054         #define LUABIND_MSVC_TYPENAME typename
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 // the maximum number of arguments of functions that's
00058 // registered. Must at least be 2
00059 #ifndef LUABIND_MAX_ARITY
00060         #define LUABIND_MAX_ARITY 10
00061 #elif LUABIND_MAX_ARITY <= 1
00062         #undef LUABIND_MAX_ARITY
00063         #define LUABIND_MAX_ARITY 2
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 // the maximum number of classes one class
00067 // can derive from
00068 // max bases must at least be 1
00069 #ifndef LUABIND_MAX_BASES
00070         #define LUABIND_MAX_BASES 4
00071 #elif LUABIND_MAX_BASES <= 0
00072         #undef LUABIND_MAX_BASES
00073         #define LUABIND_MAX_BASES 1
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 // LUABIND_NO_ERROR_CHECKING
00077 // define this to remove all error checks
00078 // this will improve performance and memory
00079 // footprint.
00080 // if it is defined matchers will only be called on
00081 // overloaded functions, functions that's
00082 // not overloaded will be called directly. The
00083 // parameters on the lua stack are assumed
00084 // to match those of the function.
00085 // exceptions will still be catched when there's
00086 // no error checking.
00087 
00088 // LUABIND_NOT_THREADSAFE
00089 // this define will make luabind non-thread safe. That is,
00090 // it will rely on a static variable. You can still have
00091 // multiple lua states and use coroutines, but only
00092 // one of your real threads may run lua code.
00093 
00094 // LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00095 // this define will disable all usage of try, catch and throw in
00096 // luabind. This will in many cases disable runtime-errors, such
00097 // as invalid casts, when calling lua-functions that fails or
00098 // returns values that cannot be converted by the given policy.
00099 // Luabind requires that no function called directly or indirectly
00100 // by luabind throws an exception (throwing exceptions through
00101 // C code has undefined behavior, lua is written in C).
00102 
00103 #ifdef LUABIND_DYNAMIC_LINK
00104 # ifdef BOOST_WINDOWS
00105 #  ifdef LUABIND_BUILDING
00106 #   define LUABIND_API __declspec(dllexport)
00107 #  else
00108 #   define LUABIND_API __declspec(dllimport)
00109 #  endif
00110 # else
00111 #  if defined(_GNUC_) && _GNUC_ >=4
00112 #   define LUABIND_API __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00113 #  endif
00114 # endif
00115 #endif
00116 
00117 #ifndef LUABIND_API
00118 # define LUABIND_API
00119 #endif
00120 
00121 namespace luabind {
00122 
00123 LUABIND_API void disable_super_deprecation();
00124 
00125 } // namespace luabind
00126 
00127 #endif // LUABIND_CONFIG_HPP_INCLUDED
